value.name: Organized labor pushes for racial justice on anniversary of George Floyd’s murder
value.description: All of them came to honor George Floyd on the one-year anniversary of his murder by Minneapolis police, to keep alive the fight for racial justice his death sparked last May. “I’m sad to say, but nobody is coming to save us.
